operator: Wayumi Aero-Taxi - Linea Aéreo Taxi Wayumi
schedule: San Juan de Manapiare – Puerto Ayacucho
circumstances: Few minutes after takeoff from San Juan de Manapiare, while flying in marginal weather conditions, the single engine aircraft impacted a rocky face of Mt Morrocoy located about 8 km west of San Juan de Manapiare. The aircraft was totally destroyed by impact forces and all four occupants were killed.
